results.name: Odd part of a(n) is of form (4^k-1)/3.
comment: Also numbers that need at most one (3x+1) operation to reach 1 in the Collatz conjecture.
Also, members of A023758 divisible by 3, divided by 3 (conjectured).
link: Index entries for sequences related to 3x+1 (or Collatz) problem
mathematica: Select[Range[2600], IntegerQ@ Log[4, 3 # + 1] &@ NestWhile[#/2 &, #, IntegerQ[#/2] &] &] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, May 12 2017 *)
